channel.title: Changing the welcome message!
channel.description:
how do I change this?
btw.. i've already tryed searching in my clinet.jar for "welcome to" and i've already edited it to my server... but I can't find where it says... "forums are: "
someone please help me? :(
[img]http://imgtool.in/images/wtfqjq.png[/img]

item.title: Changing the welcome message!
item.dc:creator: @codyskate5021 codyskate5021
item.description:
@codyskate5021 wrote:

[quote=“Waterfire, post:1, topic:417279”]how do I change this?

btw… i’ve already tryed searching in my clinet.jar for “welcome to” and i’ve already edited it to my server… but I can’t find where it says… "forums are: "

someone please help me?

[/quote] easiest way is to open your source search in search bar “client.java” open that file… then do ctrl + f type “welcome to” there are the 2 log in messages

Read full topic
